title.rendered: ENG vs IND Match Prediction, Playing XI, Pitch Report, Injury Update- India Tour of England, 2nd ODI

content.rendered:
After a shameful defeat from the Indian team, England team will once again be clashing against India in their 2nd ODI match held at the Lords cricket stadium, and this time definitely with the mindset of settling the scores.

India after their win in the first ODI, are leading the ODI series by 1-0 and in their second clash as well will be looking forward to win it with flying colors and also to win the series. Just before we get into the match details of England vs. India, 2nd ODI tomorrow, let’s have a quick recap of the previous match.

After winning the toss, Rohit Sharma decided to bowl and came out with his star pacer Mohammed Shami and Jasprit Bumrah. Astonishingly, in the second over itself, England lost its two important wickets  in the form of Jason Roy (0 off 5), Joe Root ( 0 off 2) and then accompanying Bumrah in his play, Mohammed Shami Started with Ben Stokes (0 off 1).

Cutting short, Jasprit Bumrah being the star performer of the play was declared the player of the match for his 6 wickets innings whereas from the other end, Mohammed Shami took 3 wickets.

No one except for Jos Butler (30 off 32) and David Willey (21 off 26) were able to withstand the bowling attack from India for longer hours. The entire England team were surprisingly all out for 110 runs.

Now from the Indian batting side, it was just the opposite. India, without losing a wicket, chased the miniature total of 110 runs in 18.5 overs itself. Credits goes to Rohit Sharma, 76 run innings from 58 balls which included seven 4s and five 6s along with Shikhar Dhawan’s 31 runs for 54 deliveries.

India won the 1st ODI against England by 10 wickets, and took the lead by 1-0 in the series.

Now let us know about the England Vs India 2nd ODI match details.

  • Venue – Lords Cricket Stadium
  • Date & Time – 14th July, 2022, 5:30 PM
  • Live Streaming – Sony Liv and Sony Six

Weather Report  – With wind speeds upto 8 kmph, and precipitation for 10 percent, there isn’t worryin about the match, however, it will be a cloudy day in the city.

Pitch Report – The wickets of lords looks quite in favor of the bowler again this time. However, it doesn’t mean that batters have to worry about it. The pitch can easily help the batter accelerate upto 250 plus runs if played correctly.

England Vs India 2nd ODI match Squads

England – Jonny Bairstow, Ben Stokes, Joe Root, Jason Roy, Jos Buttler (c & wk), Moeen Ali, David Willey, Craig Overton, Liam Livingstone, Brydon Carse, Reece Topley

India – Shikhar Dhawan, Suryakumar Yadav, Ravindra Jadeja, Rohit Sharma (c), Shreyas Iyer,  Rishabh Pant (wk), Hardik Pandya, Mohammed Shami, Yuzvendra Chahal, Jasprit Bumrah, Prasidh Krishna

Match prediction – Now the England vs India 2nd ODI match, will be mainly hanging on who will toss first. Because the winning team knowing the pitch will try to look for chase rather than to bat first. Secondly, if we look at both teams, the England team has strength in their batsmen whereas the Indian side has a quite balanced side. If India wants to win this game, the only way for them is that their batters perform, rest all is fine.

Final Prediction – Although it’s expected to be a tough competition between the two teams, still India seems very likely to win the England vs. India 2nd ODI match as well.

Read more: Manjunath upsets Srikanth, Sindhu too wins in Singapore Open
